title: Wonderful
text: The owners were great. Our room was a double. The bedrooms were connected by a door also through the bathroom. Each room had its own entrance if need be. The room had a shower & a huge tub. Breakfast was served every morning. They gave you a menu of your choices for the morning. I have a fussy Granddaughter. So when picking our choices I would write needed to be omitted. I ordered plain pancakes another breakfast had to have no whipped cream. Walking distance to several restaurants & the harbor. Again the owners were very sweet. I would definitely go back.

title: Great App!
text:
I use this app constantly to find a short or long stay when we need to get away. There is so much variety in terms of accommodations and options for payment before you go. There is also hassle-free cancellation should you find that you need to. It‚Äôs convenient and so easy to use. Just type in your destination or search category such as beaches in a specific local and tap the button. A plethora of options will appear. Also, the more you use, the more you‚Äôre rewarded, I.e. genius status
With levels. Love this!

title: Wonderful!
text: I didn‚Äôt even get the chance to stay at this beautiful establishment but I still had a great experience with them. I booked a very nice suite for my fianc√©s birthday. Before the date they were able to accommodate for my special request. Unexpectedly I ended up giving birth the day before our reservation so I was still in the hospital during our reservation. Not only did they accept the cancellation last minute, but also made an exception and did so at no charge. Definitely will try and reschedule to be able to stay here

title: Bookings
text:
We have been using and loving the BOOKINGS app for a few years now. It is the flexibility to reserve a few options while researching the trip! 

So, we made a few reservations over the last few days for an upcoming trip in the fall and as soon as I ran the options by my husband, we Made our choice and went back and released the other two rooms so that those properties can book those rooms for others searching for their trips.  

This and the many properties they offer is what makes Bookings so terrific!

title: Wishing Fish Villa was Spectacular
text: I am an avid traveler and the one thing I love most is a clean and luxurious hotel stay! Wishing fish had it all-private beach-comfy clean beds-amazing grounds! This 3 bedroom villa was the highlight of our trip! Daphny made sure we were so welcomed with treats and essentials in the fridge! I will be coming back! The bathrooms were stocked with l'occitane bath products! We use these same high end bath products at home so we felt so pampered! The outside shower was amazing for after beach time! Everything was so well thought out! 6 Star caliber! Thank you Wishing Fish for such an amazing villa!

title: 3 bad experience
text:
Well I tried this app three times, first time a booked an appointment in krakow which was supposed to be for 20 euros , but when I paid online they charged me 45 euros , as the hidden fee was for cleaning service and no one know how much is it and how much they take, the second one was same but in Vienna booked for 90euro and i was charged for 130 euros. That is not all  the last one is funny, I booked a hotel in krakow and my flight arrived 11:00pm and when I reached the hotel no one was in the reception after waiting a long time i had to book an expensive hotel after 1:00am over that next morning i was charged for the hotel 205PLN which was supposed to be 150PLN . I tried to contact the support they replied me after two weeks and they said  the hotel was waiting for you we can‚Äôt refund. 
I am done with bookings scams

title: Very user friendly
text: The booking app is very user friendly. I didn't start out using it with the intent of it being my one-stop shop for hotel bookings, but it is now! We have been living in Europe for a year now and travel often with our giant dog. The Booking interface, map, and filter options make it so easy to find the right place for us. I have never been led astray by their listings. Also, I hardly ever wrote reviews on places before, but Booking's review process is simple and quick, which I appreciate very much, and I almost always write a review using the app. Thanks Booking!

title: Mountain View Cabins
text: Our cabin was very nice & clean. We had the king cabin & the bed was so comfortable. Nancy came around to make sure we had everything we needed. She was so friendly & helpful. She brought us a coffee pot but she also offered coffee vouchers. We had a great time setting out on our little porch & talking with the other guest. Cheryl was our house keeper & she went out of her way to make our stay wonderful! It was our 55th anniversary & Cheryl made it extra special with a small gift. These people are wonderful! We would definitely come back. üëçüëç

title: Such a beatiful place to stay!
text:
Abdell was a great host and the apt was excellent! First of all l, he offered free pick-up and drop-off service and he made it on time at the airport when we landed. Also he was very polite and honest to us.
Just too many great things about him and the accommodation! üòä
As soon as we checked in, we were so pleased about very clean, modernized and spacious apartment with all the appliances inclduing a laundry machine, coffe machine, utensils, microwave, built-in fridge etc. I enjoyed beautiful sunset every day I stayed there too! 

If I come back to Marrakech I would definitely stay there again! Thanks again Abdell!! üôè

title: Good for the price accommodation!
text: Our room was sparkly clean! No any sign of mold. Everyday, it was being cleaned which makes our atmosphere really relaxing every time we get back. Close to everything as in walking distance to city center, attractions , restaurants and transportation. It would be helpful though if will add some mirrors. Every morning my husband and I were struggling in sharing the mirror in the bathroom (need to do my vanity thing while he‚Äôs shaving etc) in order for us to catch our tour in time. Other than that, our stay was great!

title: One night stay
text:
The other guests were a bit noisy but they eventually quieted down. Loved the shower. Had bars for my elderly disabled father to hold when getting in and out of the shower/tub. 

The disabled rooms only offered one bed. No two bed option available so the shower having a bar to hold made showering possible. But a two bed option in a disabled room would have been better. Right now, my elderly father can still stand some so he could get in and out with assistance but we already have a wheel chair for him because he can‚Äôt stand and walk long at all. So a true disabled shower will be needed in the future so we can roll him into the shower.

title: This is the worst lodging experience in my 30 year of traveling experience
text:
I did give Central cliff suit one star because the actual hotel does exist on the cliff and in fact the apartment itself is spacious and cute. 
But after one night, we had to abandon the forfeit the second night‚Äôs pay and moved to a better hotel in Aressana and spa suit. 
The people who claimed they help manage this apartment was very rude. When I complained the was nothing provided in the room, they answered ‚Äúthis is the low budget apartment, what do you expect.‚Äù 
 the AC is not working so makes the cave style of lodging very humid inside and suffocating. We couldn‚Äôt sleep the whole night. 
The water pipe in the outer room is broken so all the water leaks underneath and flowed out a puddle on the floor. You think by closing the cabinet you can contain the water leakage? 
The hot tub is filled with murky water and the temperature is about 40 F. I think even if you go there in summer when it is 100F, the tub is still too cold to use. 
There is nothing provided. Even a motel will provide bare minimum such as drinking glasses. The towel is so rough it can cut your skin. We asked for extra blanket but it never came.

title: Quaint little hotel
text:
We had a pleasant stay despite the hotel undergoing a renovation. We didn‚Äôt hear any noise. Room is pretty small but I think this is the norm in most hotels in New York. It‚Äôs clean and pretty neat. Toilet amenity set is complete, though this doesn‚Äôt bother me coz we always carry our own kit. 
Most importantly the staff are very pleasant and helpful, and really goes out of their way to help. 
Location is very convenient, it is one block away from the subway. Plenty of restaurants in the area too. 
Definitely will stay here again on my future visits and will recommend it to friends.

title: Expensive but has the needed if you‚Äôre transiting
text:
You have to go through customs and follow signs to ‚ÄúJewel‚Äù (a beautiful mall within the airport), hotel is on 4th floor.  Has its own bathroom, bed, TV.  No windows so it‚Äôs a little stuffy. Very tight if you‚Äôre two people and suitcases. 

Price was 206 USD for one night (Jan 2023),  for a hundred more you can stay at the Crown Plaza with pool and closer to customs.  Might be worth it if you have big suitcases‚Ä¶this hotel is ok for carry-on as it‚Äôs a bit tight.  

Bought take out at ‚ÄúMama Mia‚Äù,  it was delicious and fast.  When you come out of the hotel go right on the same floor,  restaurant is on the same side. I recommend it if you are in the mood for Italian food!

title: Love this app But‚Ä¶.
text:
I‚Äôve use this app for travel in the United States Canada Mexico and Europe and I love it. Great rates good reviews easy to use. 
But one thing I don‚Äôt understand, as an older person, is why you can‚Äôt print out your itinerary on multiple sheets in a cohesive map format for when there is no service. Or at least upload it as a file to your phone to keep for an offline reference when you don‚Äôt have Internet while you‚Äôre traveling.
Also it would be handy to have a Notes field for each location so that you save the places you‚Äôd like to visit while you‚Äôre there.

title: Absolutely delightful.
text: Sabina & Salvo where the absolute best hosts.  We didn‚Äôt have any expectations spending a night in Naples. We arrived to coffee and amazing vibes. Me and my fianc√© explored the whole city (drinks, shopping, sight seeing) then came back to the apartment to a fine dining experience. Salvo is truly a special cook. He is Michelin star trained and doesn‚Äôt mess around. Sabina was there for support to make the experience top notch and brought amazing energy. Also the building/room is so historical and unique you feel like you are staying in a royal suite back in the day.  Was awesome! 5 stars!

title: Montpellier, France
text: LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION says it all. The location of this apartment is the best. I walked out the door and I was in El Centro. Any direction from the apartment led me to restaurants, plazas, and historical sights. The apartment is bright, homey and relaxing. The host and Julien have been very accommodating and responsive. Lovely people. Very clean apartment. Temperature inside was perfect. Opened the window/door during the day and closed it around 3 am or so when it felt cooler. Comfy firm bed, which I need for my bad back and my arthritic joints. It was my home away from home. Very happy I stayed here. Love this city!

title: Don‚Äôt use Booking
text: I‚Äôve been trying to get my money back from tel for over 4 months now. A hotel they had on their list only takes cash so I had to get again pay the hote once I get there ‚Ä¶. I started the process to get a refund and just for them to start the refund process ‚Ä¶. I spoke with 13 different customer representative and every one of them would not transfer me to a manager to work something out they didn‚Äôt know how to do ‚Ä¶. Their response was ‚ÄúI will message my superior to get help on this matter and reach back out when I get a response .‚Äù Non of them reached back out ‚Ä¶. Don‚Äôt pay directly through the site/app or ever use them again ‚Ä¶ and it‚Äôs insane how booking doesn‚Äôt have a live human customer service you can call now ‚Ä¶.

title: Travel delight and ease!
text: Love this app! We have been using it for over 3 years and it just gets better and better over time with our bookings and rewards! Using this app has had us treated like VIP with hotel associates during check in we have been upgraded and made sure we have been treated fairly and have been accommodated! Highly recommend using this app for your travel bookings great rewards and quality! Easy to use, book, and many reviews also a great way to communicate with your booked stay!

title: Summer Winds Inn & Suites
text: I love this place I‚Äôve been here like two months now, I have a oceanfront with my own balcony it‚Äôs beautiful, I mean people get on here an complain about things that for one I‚Äôve never seen a roach or a bed bug in my room, I mean if there‚Äôs a roach in ur room it‚Äôs either ur nasty or ur neighbor is all I have to do is clean take care of the place like it‚Äôs ur home I do. But anyways there‚Äôs a lady that works the front desk here her name is Nikki she is the best, she will help u with anything. She is #1. So what all this is saying the place is very nice an take care of the place like ur home an there will be no issues.

title: Not a happy customer
text: I booked a get away on Wednesday for my daughter and friends and I have confirmation as well we got to destation last night and they gave our room away at days inn an suites in Orlando Florida and would not put us in sister hotel or help in anyway . Booked from yesterday to Monday. We had called them yesterday morning to see if we could cancel due to a situation the hotel manager said no if we did would charge whole fee so we drove over 3 hours there. To have to pay more money at la quinta suites because of situation. I stayed on hold with book it . Com for 45 minutes until I hung up when it said wait time was 10 minutes. I call all of it bad business. Would of drove back but already had reservations at sea world today as well.

title: Super hotel stay!
text: I stayed there for a week in May. It was the perfect hotel for me as a single traveler and traveling for the first time abroad in four years. It‚Äôs friendly staff and check in and everything was bright and shiny and clean & my room was a haven. The beds and pillows were out of this world and I also had a patio with a view of the port and the city. The restaurant and room service were also excellent, as well as the abundant breakfast. so was the help from the front desk when I needed to go on a side trip. I would definitely stay here again. It was super comfortable. Deborah Filcoff

title: This is what you need
text:
What i like about this app, it very detailed and very organized at the same time.
You choose the hotel then you get to compare the rooms and see pictures for every type of room.
After booking you can have all the information like ways to get to your hotel and it also shows you the hotel address in local language.
The review system is perfect as well, you‚Äôre review will be checked very fast.
If you wanna travel or you don‚Äôt feel going home for bed, I highly recommend you to download this app and start booking.

title: Satisfied
text: The app is very useful since I have a habit of last minute trips. The prices are very reasonable and I enjoy looking at all the properties. One thing I would do is make sure all the info is updated.  I was wanting to swim and booked a room with indoor pool and it had been under construction. So needless to say I didn‚Äôt get to swim. Also booked a smoking room and got to my room and found out there was none witch normally would be fine but I was traveling with a companion not my children and just wanted to relax and have a drink not run up and down stairs all night . So great app very helpful just would be nice for the info to be right. Thanks so much

title: April stay 2019
text:
We stay here on every trip back home to Ohio! Never have a problem. Only thing that was VERY DISAPPOINTING!!! They never once refilled any of breakfast foods! Even though they still had an HOUR before it‚Äôs over!!!! This is NOT fair!! Our stay for 3 or 4 days even 5 when we do 5 . Is pricey... So knowing we can go down stairs to eat is a blessing!!!  We stayed at a Wyngate by Wyndham on Monday before we got to our favorite at BAYMONT! And they kept refilling eggs, meats, potatoes. For people. PLEASE realize not everyone can get to go down to breakfast at 6 or 7 am. Especially if have disability issues to slow us down getting ready in mornings! 
Thank you!!‚Äô

title: Love this app
text: I have been using this app for my daughter and I the past two years...some of the trips I had booked I had to cancel due to weather. Just make sure before you book that there is a 100% cancellation fee unless you are 100% sure you are going. I lost some money due to not double checking that fact. The pictures have been accurate and I like that I can get a hold of the hotels through the app itself. I recommend this app to anyone planning a trip in the future and it‚Äôs nice to flip through and look forward to everything.

title: Beautiful, Modern and Clean!
text:
I booked this apartment at the last minute and I  am glad I did. The apartment was cozy, spacious  beautiful and clean.  If you are looking for a place to stay, this is it‚Ä¶ you will not regret it. The beds are so confortable, they have plenty of towels, great wifi, coffee, tea, a refrigerator and everything that you need to have an enjoyable stay. If I could, I would rate this place is more stars‚Ä¶ 
Next time I am in Reims, France. I will stay here again, not only it is so close to everything. Also, the portier was so helpful and responsive!!

title: You‚Äôll feel like paying too much
text: I feel like the prince I paid for my stay was too high. The reasons are; horrible staff poor communication, no information once og ever about the amenities, breakfast hours, check out time. When I checked in I felt like I came from Mars, the receptionist wasn‚Äôt welcoming at all. The ‚ÄúHotell‚Äù looks horrible from the outside, it is not in a very nice neighborhood. The nice shops are a bit far, the closest shops are in a ruff neighborhood. The pool was really cold and the internet not working from my room 124. I let the receptionist know about this and the only thing he said was ‚Äú I Understand ‚Äú . The breakfast was a joke, no eggs, nothing for the bread but jelly and cream cheese, It kept running out of cups and spoons, not effort to please the guest. No body in the breakfast area, it was crowded and small. I paid $175 for this. Not happy

title: B n B in Harrisburg
text: Very Clean, spacious and nice decor. I wanted to take the couches with us. Didn‚Äôt look very comfy but they definitely were.  Looked newly renovated. New carpet and floors. Big spacious kitchen. Had no issues parking even though it‚Äôs crowded. Our space was always available. You just park more on the sidewalk so your car doesn‚Äôt get dinged due to people parking on both sides of the small one car road. Check in was super easy and convenient. People in the area were nice. One car stopped to welcome us. Would stay again and recommend.

title: Wow Much Easier to Navigate & Use!!
text: I find BOOKING much easier to use and navigate especially since I am not savvy to apps as I am a Senior. I‚Äôm comparing it against quite a few of the other ‚Äúbig ones‚Äù out there such as Expedia and Travelocity. The App had already located my closest Airport and gave me a taxis rate from there to my destination. The same with a car rental and one other item. It was listed on the same page under my confirmation info so I didn‚Äôt have to hunt for it. A nice reminder that you may want to utilize the services!!

title: Booking is the way to go!
text: I‚Äôve been using booking for a couple years and every time I do it‚Äôs very convenient and although some property listing might not be exact the reviews really help tell you weather your stay will be worth the booking. I enjoy the Free cancellation at times for those moments of uncertainty or emergencies. I love that this app encourages you and reminds you to leave your opinion right after your stay to really let others and the property know your pros and cons, overall it‚Äôs a nice app to have for travel üôÇ

title: Trip to Switzerland NO Refund or Re-booking
text:
I have booked a trip to Switzerland last year through booking and due to covid I wasn‚Äôt able to make it. Tap airline have a covid policy that they will refund the ticket or give credit to a new flight. 
I called booking so many times and a India call center would answer either hang up the phone or tell me booking won‚Äôt refund any ticket so they can‚Äôt help me. I always talked highly of booking to all my family and friends so I‚Äôm very disappointed with the way they handle this situation I don‚Äôt mind taking the lost at this point but I‚Äôm definitely not using them for my future travels. If you are reading this be very careful. Try calling their customer service a couple of times before you book anything lol.

title: Louis .J
text: So the hotel is really clean and the staff is amazing. When leaving the hotel I forgot my jewelry box full with over $8,000 worth of jewelry, it‚Äôs amazing what you can forget when you‚Äôre running late for a flight , anyway the house keeping gave it to the Manager, witch I thought was amazing because I know it‚Äôs a lot of people on earth that would‚Äôve just stole it, I was on the next flight the following day to get my jewelry... I just want to say thank again for being honest and caring. I will definitely book with this hotel again.

title: The Fritch‚Äôs
text: We‚Äôve now stayed 4 years in a row for my birthday and I wouldn‚Äôt want to celebrate it anywhere else. The consistency in their attention to every detail of your stay never ceases to amaze me. Although it‚Äôs a quiet town in some ways the weasku in really does ‚Äúask you inn ‚Äú with its cleanliness, hospitality, and don‚Äôt get me started on Their complimentary meals! You might as well be at the ritz for breakfast and the afternoon snack is basically a 5 course meal with everything fresh and quality. I‚Äôve never had a better sleep or meal anywhere I‚Äôve stayed so thank you and. you have patrons for life üòä

title: Excellent facility and staff
text: The room we booked was a king suite as we bring our 2 Yorkie puppies with us. The room is spacious and having a kitchenette with microwave, refrigerator, sink and counter is great when you have your pets with you. Coffee is free whenever you need it, is another great perk if you are coffee drinkers. The staff at the front desk, room techs, and breakfast bar are friendly, helpful and professional. They will go out of their way to help. They are like extended family. The hotel is well situated to shopping centers, movies and Resturants. We will continue to use this hotel when we come to York to see family.

title: Good app for finding good places to stay
text: I have used this app to find hotels for a while now. It‚Äôs a good app for that and I‚Äôve found mostly good deals. I can‚Äôt give 5 stars as I have noticed their support team can be slow to respond. I also had a negative review for a hotel that truly deserved it and I was told it violated their standards but they never told me how, what needed to be edited, or even how to edit the review. This was disappointing as I wanted to warn others about the location. Thankfully, I noticed I wasn‚Äôt the only one so people will know about that location. If not for that I probably wouldn‚Äôt have kept my rating at 4 stars.

title: Great Value, Great Stay
text: Enjoyed our stay and the room was comfortable and affordable. I would stay at this location again. Breakfast fulfilled our needs - not gourmet of course, but for free, it was adequate. My son enjoyed making a Texas-shaped cinnamon-apple waffle. The Raisin Bran cereal seemed fresh. My only minor issue was upon arrival there was no one at the checkin-desk. I actually had to call the phone number on my confirmation and the checkin-desk phone began to ring. The Office Staff heard the phone and appeared from behind a closed door to check me in. Standing at an empty checkin-desk for three or four minutes at night was a bit disconcerting, so hopefully that is a one-time incident.

title: Easy to use and excellent service
text: The Booking ap is easy to search ad super easy to use. This year we had a ton of hotels to book as we were shuffling to different family members to manage a family crisis. We had to change our plans on the fly several times and with Booking we were never stuck paying for a hotel we had to cancel. An added bonus, after several stays we achieved genius status and saved even more money on excellent hotels. Booking made everything possible for us. Great folks and a remarkable service.

title: Not recommended for family
text: I was travelling with my family and it‚Äôs our first time staying at the hotel. The receptionist is not friendly when I check in and gave us a different type of room than the one I requested. The shower and tap water was all the way HOT, not even warm. We have to let the toilet door OPEN THE WHOLE TIME WE ARE SHOWERING. It was really a bad experience from the start. Our room tripped when we were using the hotel iron. They did not investigate further the cause (either the power point or the iron itself) I would never book at this place again.

title: Great Stay at Marshan Villa
text: Mark was a absolute great host , he gave good driving prices compared to anybody else we encountered out here. He also drove us in downtown Jamaica to sight see a little bit and didn‚Äôt even ask for more $ because of it. He was informative and down to earth. The stay itself was great the whole apartment was to ourselves . A/c, tv, balcony to smoke, bathroom, kitchen. If you do decide to stay here I would suggest to go to a grocery store for food for the place so you won‚Äôt have to keep coming back outside paying for more rides.

title: This makes traveling less stressful.
text: This is the only way my family travels! It gives me peace of mind that we will get there and have everything we are looking for. Being able to key in on the details I don‚Äôt want to go with out like the view, beach access, distance from attractions we want to visit. Having the free cancellation on most bookings I personally won‚Äôt book without that feature. I have canceled twice in the beginning of COVID but the app made it extremely convenient and easy. I love this app.

title: Good nights rest
text: This place isn‚Äôt for everyone. If I have a clean bed, that is my main concern. We spent the night as a stop off to Chicago. The building is huge and must have been gorgeous when it was built. The lobby is beautiful. It appears to have declined greatly. It seems that they are renovating it, but it has a long way to go. The receptionist was friendly and gave us a room with a new mattress. Our room could have been cleaner, but all in all, it was fine for us. We would stay here again. I hope that they are able to restore it and bring it back to life.

title: Not exactly what was advertised
text:
They site did a very good job in photographing the good sides of the hotel. It‚Äôs a beautiful property and I love that it‚Äôs not deep in the tourist area. The cliff beach views were our favorite.
We spent most our time outside so if you are only looking for a place to sleep and shower I would recommend

The room itself was just not what I was expecting, the pillows were tiny, there was no fan in the room, the sliding door had seen better days, and the towels needs some updating. They brought us towel that had holes in them and were ripped :/  I think the picture on their site show their updated area but don‚Äôt give you a realistic view on their current rooms. They are not updated and do not have jacuzzi tubs 

Wifi can be a little spotty but I was able to work from my room once it was back up and running. Apparently the first night we were there it wasn‚Äôt working. 

I do want to say the staff was incredible and very hospitable! The continental breakfast was delicious and included!

title: Fabulous!
text:
Absolutely the best experience I‚Äôve ever had at a B&B inn!
Not only was the room complete with a private bath, with both tub and shower, the room and amenities were amazingly comfortable.
Vanessa is without a doubt, a most helpful and engaging hostess, who also cooks and serves up a delicious breakfast. I had a wonderful time meeting the other guests at morning breakfast in the dining room. This innkeeper and her staff really bend over backwards to ensure that all the guests  receive a nice warm welcome, and truly have a lovely comfortable stay. I really wish I could have stayed longer!

title: Piper Beers Review
text:
We loved our stay at Blue Door. My boyfriend and I were a bit disappointed that the pool wasn‚Äôt open since the website said it would be the day we arrived, but we understand there was construction. The room was very clean and the bed was extremely comfortable. Our only qualm with the room was the pillows on the bed. They were very fluffy and collapsed when you laid your head on 
them, which made our sleep not too comfortable. But overall the rest of the stay made up for the pillows. If we spend another weekend in Estes we‚Äôll definitely stay here again, we‚Äôll just bring our own pillows next time ;)

title: Spacious beautiful apartment in the center of everything
text:
Our family just had an amazing Florence experience staying in this apartment. I can‚Äôt recommend it enough. The apartment is beautiful with characteristic Italian decorative elements. It is very spacious and has separate areas to provide privacy for the family members. Having a bedroom and a bathroom is a very nice touch. Eduardo is a very gracious host who helped to make our stay even more pleasant.
Location of the apartment is the biggest plus - all the attractions within a few minutes walk

title: I‚Äôve been booking through them a lot
text:
I used to be a trivago and kayak guy, but after using booking for my last three or four trips - I find they have great options and the best prices, and I just found out I‚Äôm getting rewards back now which is even more cool!

Also the hotels we‚Äôve stayed at have all been pretty great, we had an issue with one hotel in Orlando and booking ensured our refund was accounted for and our complaint was filed accordingly as well! 

So far I‚Äôm sold on sticking with them from now on.

title: Amazing Apartment
text:
Alberto and Francesco were awesome hosts. They made sure my family of 5 received 5 star service. Prompt responses via email, WhatsApp and phone calls. Unit was very clean and beautiful. The only recommendation, I wish they had a few extra soft pillows. There were plenty of pillow types. My daughter took the only extra soft pillow there. The unit was very clean. Location is in the heart of Florence. Everything walking distance including train station. 
I can‚Äôt wait to come back here. 

Thank you Alberto and Francesco for the amazing hospitality.
Arien/Zohra

title: Extremely poor experience
text: We did not even make it into the apartment‚Äî the apartment manager (Widad) did NOT SHOW UP TO LET US IN AND LEFT US ON THE STREET WAITING FOR 2.5 hours between 9:30- 11:30 pm.  She also tried to make us pay $200 extra on top of what we were already charged for late check-in. Even after that, she was a NO SHOW and then the apartment owner (Monica) refused to refund us or help us. WORST EXPERIENCE EVER. On top of that, the apartment has NO AC OR FANS and that was not in the description. Thank goodness an extremely kind owner at a different apartment agreed to rent her place to us (Dijon was completely booked up at all hotels) at 11:30pm and we ended having an amazing time in her air-conditioned and immaculate place. I strongly advise against the Harry Potter experience fraudsters!! Find another place!!

title: Italian trip October trip 2021 amid Covid
text:
First of all it was so nice to speak to a real live person with a clear connection. I had to cancel a reservation after the cancellation date but a week before arrival due to not having results back on Covid test in time in America.
